Name: Burning Blood
Desc: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP. Your body's own blood burns with an undying rage.

Name: Cracked Core
Desc: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning . The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire. It appears to be cracked.

Name: Pure Water
Desc: At the start of each combat, add 1 Miracle into your hand. Filtered through fine sand and free of impurities.

Name: Ring of the Snake
Desc: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards. Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.

Name: Akabeko
Desc: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage Muuu~

Name: Anchor
Desc: Start each combat with 10 Block . Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.

Name: Ancient Tea Set
Desc: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 extra Energy . The key to a refreshing night's rest.

Name: Art of War
Desc: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional Energy next turn. This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age.

Name: Bag of Marbles
Desc: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. A once popular toy in the City. Useful for throwing enemies off balance.

Name: Bag of Preparation
Desc: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards. Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.

Name: Blood Vial
Desc: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP. A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.

Name: Bronze Scales
Desc: Start each combat with 3 Thorns . The sharp scales of the Guardian. Rearranges itself to protect its user.

Name: Centennial Puzzle
Desc: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards. Upon solving the puzzle you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.

Name: Ceramic Fish
Desc: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold . Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.

Name: Damaru
Desc: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra . The sound of the small drum keeps your mind awake, revealing a path forward.

Name: Data Disk
Desc: Start each combat with 1 Focus . This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.

Name: Dream Catcher
Desc: Whenever you Rest, you may add a card to your deck. The northern tribes would often use dream catchers at night, believing they led to self improvement.

Name: Happy Flower
Desc: Every 3 turns, gain 1 Energy . This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.

Name: Juzu Bracelet
Desc: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms. A ward against the unknown.

Name: Lantern
Desc: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat. An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.

Name: Maw Bank
Desc: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold . No longer works when you spend any Gold at a shop. Surprisingly popular, despite maw attacks being a regular occurrence.

Name: Meal Ticket
Desc: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP. Complimentary meatballs with every visit!

Name: Nunchaku
Desc: Every time you play 10 Attacks , gain 1 Energy . A good training tool. Improves the posture and agility of the wielder.

Name: Oddly Smooth Stone
Desc: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity . You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.

Name: Omamori
Desc: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain. A common charm for staving off vile spirits. This one seems to possess a spark of divine energy.

Name: Orichalcum
Desc: If you end your turn without Block , gain 6 Block . A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.

Name: Pen Nib
Desc: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage. Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.

Name: Potion Belt
Desc: Upon pickup, gain 2 Potion slots. I can hold more Potions using this belt!

Name: Preserved Insect
Desc: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP. The insect seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly large enemies.

Name: Red Skull
Desc: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength . A small skull covered in ornamental paint.

Name: Regal Pillow
Desc: Whenever you Rest, heal an additional 15 HP. Now you can get a proper night's rest.

Name: Smiling Mask
Desc: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold . Mask worn by the merchant. He must have spares...

Name: Snecko Skull
Desc: Whenever you apply Poison , apply an additional 1 Poison . A snecko skull in pristine condition. Mysteriously clean and smooth, dirt and grime fall off inexplicably.

Name: Strawberry
Desc: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7. "Delicious! Haven't seen any of these since the blight." - Ranwid

Name: The Boot
Desc: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5. When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.

Name: Tiny Chest
Desc: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room. "A fine prototype." - The Architect

Name: Toy Ornithopter
Desc: Whenever you use a potion , heal 5 HP. "This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer!"

Name: Vajra
Desc: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength . An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.

Name: War Paint
Desc: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills . In the past, Ironclads would create wards using enchanted war paint before charging into battle.

Name: Whetstone
Desc: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random Attacks . "Flesh never beats steel." - Kublai the Great

Name: Blue Candle
Desc: Unplayable Curse cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Curse , lose 1 HP and Exhaust it. The flame ignites when shrouded in darkness.

Name: Bottled Flame
Desc: Upon pickup, choose an Attack card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand. Inside the bottle resides a flame that eternally burns.

Name: Bottled Lightning
Desc: Upon pickup, choose a Skill card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand. Peering into the swirling maelstrom, you see a part of yourself staring back.

Name: Bottled Tornado
Desc: Upon pickup, choose a Power card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand. The bottle gently hums and whirs.

Name: Darkstone Periapt
Desc: Whenever you obtain a Curse , increase your Max HP by 6 The stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.

Name: Duality
Desc: Whenever you play an Attack , gain 1 temporary Dexterity . "And the sun was extinguished forever, as if curtains fell before it." - Zoroth

Name: Eternal Feather
Desc: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site. This feather appears to be completely indestructible. What bird does this possibly come from?

Name: Frozen Egg
Desc: Whenever you add a Power card to your deck, Upgrade it. The egg lies inert and frozen, never to hatch.

Name: Gold-Plated Cables
Desc: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time. "Interesting! Even automatons are affected by placebo." - Ranwid

Name: Gremlin Horn
Desc: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card. "Gremlin Nobs are capable of growing until the day they die. Remarkable." - Ranwid

Name: Horn Cleat
Desc: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block . Pleasant to hold in the hand. What was it for?

Name: Ink Bottle
Desc: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card. Once exhausted, appears to refill itself in a different color.

Name: Kunai
Desc: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity A blade favored by assassins for its lethality at range.

Name: Letter Opener
Desc: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies. Unnaturally sharp.

Name: Matryoshka
Desc: The next 2 non-boss chests you open contain 2 Relics. A stackable set of painted dolls. The paint depicts an unknown bird with white eyes and blue feathers.

Name: Meat on the Bone
Desc: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP. The meat keeps replenishing, never seeming to fully run out.

Name: Mercury Hourglass
Desc: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies. An enchanted hourglass that endlessly drips.

Name: Molten Egg
Desc: Whenever you add an Attack card to your deck, Upgrade it. The egg of a Phoenix. It glows red hot with a simmering lava.

Name: Mummified Hand
Desc: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn. Frequently twitches, especially when your pulse is high.

Name: Ninja Scroll
Desc: At the start each combat, add 3 Shivs into your hand. Contains the secrets of assassination.

Name: Ornamental Fan
Desc: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block . The fan seems to extend and harden as blood is spilled.

Name: Pantograph
Desc: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP. "Solid foundations are not accidental. Tools for planning are a must." - The Architect

Name: Paper Krane
Desc: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%. An origami of a creature from a past age.

Name: Paper Phrog
Desc: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%. The paper continually folds and unfolds itself into the shape of a small creature.

Name: Pear
Desc: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10. A common fruit before the Spireblight.

Name: Question Card
Desc: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from. "Those with more choices minimize the downside to chaos." - Kublai the Great

Name: Self-Forming Clay
Desc: Whenever you lose HP, gain 3 Block next turn. "Most curious! It appears to form itself loosely on my thoughts! Tele-clay?" - Ranwid

Name: Shuriken
Desc: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength . Lightweight throwing weapons. Recommend going for the eyes.

Name: Singing Bowl
Desc: When adding cards to your deck, you may raise your Max HP by 2 instead. This well-used artifact rings out with a beautiful melody when struck.

Name: Strike Dummy
Desc: Cards containing "Strike" deal 3 additional damage. It's beat up.

Name: Sundial
Desc: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain 2 Energy . "Early man's foolish obsession with time caused them to look to the sky for guidance, hoping for something permanent." - Zoroth

Name: Symbiotic Virus
Desc: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark . A little bit of bad can do a lot of good.

Name: Teardrop Locket
Desc: Start each combat in Calm . Its owner blind, its contents unseen.

Name: The Courier
Desc: The Merchant restocks cards , relics , and potions . All prices are reduced by 20%. The merchant's personal pet!

Name: Toxic Egg
Desc: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, Upgrade it. "What a marvelous discovery! This appears to be the inert egg of some magical creature. Who or what created this?" - Ranwid

Name: White Beast Statue
Desc: Potions always appear in combat rewards. A small white statue of a creature you have never seen before.

Name: Bird-Faced Urn
Desc: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP. This urn shows the crow god Mazaleth looking mischievous.

Name: Calipers
Desc: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block . "Mechanical precision leads to greatness" - The Architect

Name: Captain's Wheel
Desc: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block . Wooden trinket carved with delicate precision. A name is carved into it but the language is foreign.

Name: Champion Belt
Desc: Whenever you apply Vulnerable , also apply 1 Weak . Only the greatest may wear this belt.

Name: Charon's Ashes
Desc: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies. Charon was said to be the god of rebirth, eternally dying and reviving in a burst of flame.

Name: Cloak Clasp
Desc: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand. A simple but sturdy design.

Name: Dead Branch
Desc: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand. The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.

Name: Du-Vu Doll
Desc: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength . A doll devised to gain strength from malicious energy.

Name: Emotion Chip
Desc: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger the passive ability of all Orbs at the start of your turn. ...<3...?

Name: Fossilized Helix
Desc: Prevent the first time you would lose HP in combat. Seemingly indestructible, you wonder what kind of creature this belonged to.

Name: Gambling Chip
Desc: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. You can see a small inscription on one side. It reads: "Bear's Lucky Chip!"

Name: Ginger
Desc: You can no longer become Weakened . A potent tool in many tonics.

Name: Girya
Desc: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times). This Girya is unfathomably heavy. You could train with this to get significantly stronger.

Name: Golden Eye
Desc: Whenever you Scry , Scry 2 additional cards. See into the minds of those nearby, predicting their future moves.

Name: Ice Cream
Desc: Energy is now conserved between turns. Delicious!

Name: Incense Burner
Desc: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible . The smoke imbues its owner with the spirit of the burned.

Name: Lizard Tail
Desc: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once). A fake tail to trick enemies during combat.

Name: Magic Flower
Desc: Healing is 50% more effective during combat. A flower long thought extinct, somehow preserved in perfect condition.

Name: Mango
Desc: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14. The most coveted forgotten fruit. Impeccably preserved with no signs of Spireblight.

Name: Old Coin
Desc: Upon pickup, gain 300 Gold . Unique coins are highly valued by Merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.

Name: Peace Pipe
Desc: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites. Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.

Name: Pocketwatch
Desc: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn. The hands seem stuck on the 3 o'clock position.

Name: Prayer Wheel
Desc: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward. The wheel continues to spin, never stopping.

Name: Shovel
Desc: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites. The Spire houses all number of relics from past civilizations and powerful adventurers lost to time. Time to go dig them up!

Name: Stone Calendar
Desc: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies. The passage of time is imperceptible in the Spire.

Name: The Specimen
Desc: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy. "Fascinating! I found a mutated creature demonstrating astounding toxic properties. Storing a sample for later examination." - Ranwid

Name: Thread and Needle
Desc: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor . Wrapping the magical thread around your body, you feel harder to the touch.

Name: Tingsha
Desc: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy. The sound this instrument generates seems to be capable of reverberating to painful levels of volume.

Name: Torii
Desc: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1. Holding the small Torii, you feel a sense of calm and safety drift through your mind.

Name: Tough Bandages
Desc: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block . Loss gives strength.

Name: Tungsten Rod
Desc: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less. It's very very heavy.

Name: Turnip
Desc: You can no longer become Frail . Best with Ginger.

Name: Unceasing Top
Desc: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card. The top continues to spin effortlessly as if you were in a dream.

Name: Wing Boots
Desc: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times. Stylish.

Name: Astrolabe
Desc: Upon pickup, Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them. A tool to glean invaluable knowledge from the stars.

Name: Black Blood
Desc: Replaces Burning Blood . At the end of combat, heal 12 HP. The rage grows darker.

Name: Black Star
Desc: Elites now drop an additional relic when defeated. Originally discovered in the town of the serpent, aside a solitary candle.

Name: Busted Crown
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. Future card rewards have 2 less cards to choose from. The Champ's crown... or a pale imitation?

Name: Calling Bell
Desc: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics. This dark iron bell rang 3 times when you found it, but now stays silent.

Name: Coffee Dripper
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites. "Yes, another cup please. Back to work. Back to work!" - The Architect

Name: Cursed Key
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain a Curse . You can feel the malicious energy emanating from the key. Power comes at a price.

Name: Ectoplasm
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. You can no longer gain Gold . This blob of slime and energy seems to pulse with life.

Name: Empty Cage
Desc: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck. "How unusual to cage that which you worship." - Ranwid

Name: Frozen Core
Desc: Replaces Cracked Core . If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost . The crack in your core has been filled with a pulsating cold energy.

Name: Fusion Hammer
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites. Once wielded, the owner can never let go.

Name: Holy Water
Desc: Replaces Pure Water . At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles into your hand. Collected from a time before the Spire.

Name: Hovering Kite
Desc: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain 1 Energy . The Kite floats around you in battle, propelled by a mysterious force.

Name: Inserter
Desc: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot. Push. Pull. Stack. Repeat.

Name: Mark of Pain
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile. This brand was used by the northern tribes to signify warriors who had mastered pain in battle.

Name: Nuclear Battery
Desc: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma . Ooooh...

Name: Pandora's Box
Desc: Upon pickup, Transform all Strike and Defend cards. You have a bad feeling about opening this.

Name: Philosopher's Stone
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. ALL enemies start combat with 1 Strength . Raw energy emanates from the stone, empowering all nearby.

Name: Ring of the Serpent
Desc: Replaces Ring of the Snake . At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. Your ring has morphed and changed forms.

Name: Runic Cube
Desc: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card. The runes are indecipherable.

Name: Runic Dome
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. You can no longer see enemy intents. The runes are indecipherable.

Name: Runic Pyramid
Desc: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand. The runes are indecipherable.

Name: Sacred Bark
Desc: Double the effectiveness of potions . A bark rumored to originate from the World tree.

Name: Slaver's Collar
Desc: During Boss and Elite combats, gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. Rusty miserable chains.

Name: Snecko Eye
Desc: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused . An eye of a fallen snecko. Much larger than you imagined.

Name: Sozu
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. You can no longer obtain potions . You notice that magical liquids seem to lose their properties when near this relic.

Name: Tiny House
Desc: Upon pickup, obtain 1 Potion . Gain 50 Gold . Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 random card. "A near perfect implementation of miniaturization. My finest work to date, but still not adequate." - The Architect

Name: Velvet Choker
Desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn. "Immense power, but too limited." - Kublai the Great

Name: Violet Lotus
Desc: Whenever you exit Calm , gain an additional Energy . The old texts describe that the surface of "mana pools" were littered with these flowers.

Name: Wrist Blade
Desc: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage. Handy for assassinations.

Name: Brimstone
Desc: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength . Emanates an infernal heat.

Name: Cauldron
Desc: When obtained, brews 5 random potions . The Merchant is actually a rather skilled potion brewer. Buy 4 get 1 free.

Name: Chemical X
Desc: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2. WARNING: Do not combine with sugar, spice, and everything nice.

Name: Clockwork Souvenir
Desc: Start each combat with 1 Artifact . So many intricate gears.

Name: Dolly's Mirror
Desc: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck. I look funny in this.

Name: Frozen Eye
Desc: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order. Staring into the eye, you see a glimpse of your future.

Name: Hand Drill
Desc: Whenever you break an enemy's Block , apply 2 Vulnerable . Spirals are dangerous.

Name: Lee's Waffle
Desc: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP. "Tastiest treat you will find in all the Spire! Baked today just for you."

Name: Medical Kit
Desc: Unplayable Status cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Status card, Exhaust it. "Has everything you need! Anti-itch, anti-burn, anti-venom, and more!"

Name: Melange
Desc: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3. Mysterious sands from an unknown origin. Smells of cinnamon.

Name: Membership Card
Desc: 50% discount on all products! "Bonus membership offer for my most valuable customers!"

Name: Orange Pellets
Desc: Whenever you play a Power , Attack , and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs . Made from various fungi found throughout the Spire, they will stave off any affliction.

Name: Orrery
Desc: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck. "Once you understand the universe..." - Zoroth

Name: Prismatic Shard
Desc: Combat reward screens now contain Colorless cards and cards from other colors. Looking through the shard, you are able to see entirely new perspectives.

Name: Runic Capacitor
Desc: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots. More is better.

Name: Sling of Courage
Desc: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength . A handy tool for dealing with particularly tough opponents.

Name: Strange Spoon
Desc: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time. Staring at the spoon, it appears to bend and twist around before your eyes.

Name: The Abacus
Desc: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block . One...Two...Three...

Name: Toolbox
Desc: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand. A tool for every job.

Name: Twisted Funnel
Desc: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies. I wouldn't drink out of it.

Name: Bloody Idol
Desc: Whenever you gain Gold , heal 5 HP. The idol now weeps a constant stream of blood.

Name: Cultist Headpiece
Desc: You feel more talkative. Part of the Flock!

Name: Enchiridion
Desc: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 for that turn. The legendary journal of an ancient lich.

Name: Face of Cleric
Desc: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1. Everyone loves Cleric.

Name: Golden Idol
Desc: Enemies drop 25% more Gold . Made of solid gold, you feel richer just holding it.

Name: Gremlin Visage
Desc: Start each combat with 1 Weak . Time to run.

Name: Mark of the Bloom
Desc: You can no longer heal. In the Beyond, thoughts and reality are one.

Name: Mutagenic Strength
Desc: Start each combat with 3 Strength . At the end of your first turn, lose 3 Strength . "The results seem fleeting, triggering when the subject is in danger." - Unknown

Name: N'loth's Gift
Desc: Triples the chance of finding Rare cards from combat rewards. The strange gift from N'loth. Whenever you try and unwrap it, another wrapped box of the same size lies within.

Name: N'loth's Hungry Face
Desc: The next non-Boss chest you open is empty. You feel hungry.

Name: Necronomicon
Desc: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. Upon pickup, obtain a special Curse . Only a fool would try and harness this evil power. At night your dreams are haunted by images of the book devouring your mind.

Name: Neow's Lament
Desc: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP. The blessing of lamentation bestowed by Neow.

Name: Nilry's Codex
Desc: At the end of each turn, you may shuffle 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile. Crafted by the infamous game master himself. Said to expand one's mind.

Name: Odd Mushroom
Desc: When Vulnerable , take 25% more attack damage rather than 50%. "After consuming trichella parastius I felt larger and less... susceptible." - Ranwid

Name: Red Mask
Desc: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. This very stylish looking mask belongs to the leader of the Red Mask Bandits. Technically that makes you the leader now?

Name: Spirit Poop
Desc: It's unpleasant. The charred remains of your offering to the spirits.

Name: Ssserpent Head
Desc: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold . The most fulfilling of lives is that in which you can buy anything!

Name: Warped Tongs
Desc: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat. The cursed tongs emit a strong desire to return to where they were stolen from.

Name: Accursed
Desc: Whenever you defeat a Boss, obtain 2 random Curses .

Name: Ancient Augmentation
Desc: Enemies start combat with 1 Artifact , 10 Plated Armor , and 10 Regenerate .

Name: Durian
Desc: Lose 50% of your Max HP.

Name: Grotesque Trophy
Desc: Upon pickup, obtain 3 Prides .

Name: Hauntings
Desc: Enemies start combat with 1 Intangible .

Name: Mimic Infestation
Desc: Treasure rooms in future acts are replaced by Elites. Elites no longer drop Relics.

Name: Muzzle
Desc: You can no longer increase your Max HP. All healing is halved.

Name: Scatterbrain
Desc: Draw 1 less card a turn.

Name: Shield of Blight
Desc: Enemies have 50% more HP.

Name: Spear of Blight
Desc: Enemies deal 100% more damage.

Name: Time Maze
Desc: You cannot play more than 15 cards per turn.

Name: Twisting Mind
Desc: At the end of your turn, add 1 random Status card to the top of your draw pile.

Name: Void Essence
Desc: Lose 1 Energy permanently.

Name: Circlet
Desc: Collect as many as you can. You ran out of relics to find. Impressive!

Name: Red Circlet
Desc: You ran out of relics. Impressive! Looks very pretty.
